ModMetaData.name: Alien Cuisine
ModMetaData.author: Linruo
ModMetaData.description:
添加了"基于"部分mod种族的食物，(对下游资源进行再加工)。单独添加没有任何效果。
 Add food 'based' on some mod races, alone has no effect.
 目前内容：
 Feature:
 - 龙娘肉排(GloomyDragonianRace)
 Dragonian Steak 
 - 麻辣兔头(YuranRace)
 Spicy Rabbit 
 - 烤萌螈(MoeLoltRace)
 Grilled MoeLotl 
 - 米莉拉肉汤(MiliraRace)
 Milira Stew 
 - 狐萝卜(Miho,the celestial fox) 
 Fox Radish 
 - 雪豹芝士肉糕(MaruRace) 
 Maru Cheese 
 - 绮罗方便面(KiiroRace) 
 Kiiro Noodles 
 - 茉约琼浆(Moyo - from the depth) 
 Moyo Syrup 
 - 薇薇蜜饼(ViviRace) 
 ViviCake 
 - 蚂蚁酱(Anty the war ant race) 
 Anty Sauce 
 
 稍微添加了食用效果，仅供娱乐。
 added hediff,just for fun.
 更多信息详见steam创意工坊For more information, please refer to the Steam Workshop
